title: Haunted Loop
description: A weekday for a modest, middle-class family starts off like another routine day. Soon it becomes apparent that something is very wrong. Unwittingly the family members have departed reality and become trapped in the world of the paranormal. The key to their escape may lie in the youngest, a little girl who seems to know something that the rest of the family doesnâ€™t. Shorter than the traditional short story, this flash fiction of paranormal suspense was written for readers who want to begin and finish a spooky story in one sitting. Try this and other flash fiction works by E. Viona for more flash reading entertainment.
